text: Anriyum, (tanakkuc) cantatiyai etuttuk kollatavanum, (tan) atciyil tanakkuk kuttali evarum illatavanum, entavita palahinattai kontum enta utaviyalanum (tevai) illamalum irukkirane anta nayanukke pukal amaittum" enru (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka innum (avanai) eppolutum perumaip patutta ventiya muraiyil perumaip patuttuviraka
